title: Mini Series - State v. John Brookins – Addendum 2 – Clemency
description:
October 8, 2020 / Host Rebecca Lavoie speaks with Colin Miller and John Brookins’ attorney and wife about the current status of his case.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.
